titleStmt.title: Digital description of MS. Heb. d. 37

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on Catalogue of the Hebrew Manuscripts in the Bodleian Library, vol. ii, by Adolf Neubauer and Arthur Ernest Cowley, Oxford 1906, No. 2603.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card (for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Admissions). Contact oriental@bodleian.ox.ac.uk for further information on the availability of this manuscript

msItem.title: Genesis
msItem.note: Without vowel points.

history.provenance: On fol. 1a the following words are found: מהמחזור שלתוריה שקנה אותו יחיה בירבי הלל ר̇א̇ לחמודו וליחידו טוביה הפרח הטוב הקדוש . . . שנת תשע מאות ושבעים ושש שנים לחורבן הבית יהי רצון ... אלעזר בירבי משה יחיה .
history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Genesis and Onqelos in parallel columns
msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Genesis
msItem.note: ii. 4 to iii. 5 (כאלהים), with vowel points, accents, and the lesser Masorah.

physDesc.p: Syr. large squ. char.; 8vo, vellum, stained.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Genesis
msItem.note: xxxix. 8 (אשר) to xl. 13 (כמשפט), with vowel points, accents, and the lesser Masorah.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Leviticus
msItem.note: xxiii. 8 (תעשו) to xxv. 12, with vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Numbers
msItem.note: i. 16 (ראשי) to iii. 38 (מועד), with vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Numbers
msItem.note: xxxiii. 11 (ויחנו) to 31, with vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Deuteronomy
msItem.note: xxxiv. 4 (לא) to end, without vowel points.
At end, כמל ספר אלה הדברים בעזרת האל וכתב עמרם בר שלה ת̇נ̇צ̇ב̇ה̇ סלה.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Joshua

msItem.p: (fol. 30) 1 Samuel xxiv. 15 (אחרי מי אתה) to xxix. 4 (ירד)

msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. char.; oblong 8vo, vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Isaiah
msItem.note: With Masoretic notes (chiefly ל) between the lines, without vowel points.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Isaiah
msItem.note: xlvii. 15 (לעברו) to l. 8 (יחד מי), with vowel points, accents, and the lesser Masorah.

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. char.; 2 coll., 4to, vellum, injured.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Jeremiah
msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and the lesser Masorah.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Hosea, with the Targum after each verse
msItem.note: Without vowel points.

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. Rabb. char.; 2 coll., 4to, vellum.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Zechariah
msItem.note: viii. 2 (לציון) to 7 (מזרח), with vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Psalms
msItem.note: xix. 2 to xxvi. 11, with superlinear vowel points.

physDesc.p: Yemen squ. char.; 2 coll., 4to, vellum; obliterated and injured.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Psalms
msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Psalms
msItem.note: lxxviii. 19 (באלהים) to 55 (שבטי), with vowel points, accents, and the lesser Masorah.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: 1 Chronicles
msItem.note: With vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Haftaroth
msItem.note: according to the triennial rite (see A. Büchler in the Jewish Quarterly Review, vol. vi. p. 39 sqq.)

msItem.p: (fol. 57) beg. missing, Isaiah xlvi. 7 (ויעמד) and 13 [for ראשי המטות (Numbers xxx. 2)?];
(ibidem) heading נקם נקמת (Numbers xxxi. 2), followed by Ezekiel xxv. 14 to xxvi. 7 (כה);
(fol. 58) beg. missing, Jonah i. 8 (עם) to 9 [for רב לכם סב (Deut. ii. 3)?];
(ibidem) heading ראה החלתי (Deut. ii. 31), followed by Joshua x. 12 to 21 (ישראל, end missing);
(fol. 59) Isaiah xlii. 9 (מגיד), beg. missing to end of the verse;
(ibidem) heading דפסחא, followed by Joshua v. 2 to 12;
(fol. 60) heading ויושע יהוה (Exod. xiv. 30), followed by Judges v. 1 to 20 (מן שמים);
(fol. 62) beg. missing, Ezekiel xxxvi. 31 (הרעים) to 32, xxxvii. 14;
(ibidem) heading החדש הזה (Exod. xii. 2), followed by Isaiah xli. 27 to xlii. 9 (אני), end missing.

msItem.note: All with vowel points, accents, and both Masorahs.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Targum

msItem.p: (fol. 63) Isaiah xix. 1 to 25, headed בא אל פרעה. בישעיה. משא מצרים (Exod. x. 1)
(fol. 64) Judges iv. 23 to v. 9, headed ויהי בשלח. שפטים (Exod. xiii. 17)

msItem.note: Without vowel points.

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. Rabb. char.; oblong 8vo, vellum.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Targum

msItem.p: (fol. 66) 1 Kings from iii. 22 (לא כין בריך) to 28 (אשר שפט)

msItem.note: Also the Hebrew, each verse followed by the Targum; at end קובלת ב ; with vowel points.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Targum
msItem.note: The Targum following each verse, without vowel points.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: Treatise on שחיטה; Maccabean scroll in Aramaic
The end of a treatise on שחיטה in Arabic
msItem.note: ending פאדא אמתתל גמיע מא [וצ]פוא מן הדה אלה̇ צנאיע חלאל אכלה. כמלת הלכת שחיטה...

msItem.title: מגלת בני חשמונאי, Maccabean scroll in Aramaic
msItem.note: beginning to עלמא, ed. Jellinek (Bet ha-Midrasch vi. pp. 4-8), verse 8; ed. Gaster (Transactions of the Ninth International Congress of Orientalists, vol. ii. pp. 3-33), verse 7; without vowel points.

physDesc.p: Syr. squ. Rabb. char.; small 8vo, vellum.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).

msItem.title: מגלת בני חשמונאי, Maccabean scroll in Arabic translation

msItem.p: (fol. 70) beg. וימתדח (ed. Gaster, verse 23, וישתבח) to אלסבת ואל (ed., verse 33, שבתא)
(fol. 71) ממלכה (ed., verse 48, עממיא) to מתתיה (ed., verse 58, מתתיה).

msItem.note: See the edition in the Arabic Chrestomathy in Hebrew characters, with a glossary, edited by Dr. Hartwig Hirschfeld, London, 1892, p. 2, l. 27, and p. 4, l. 18.

history.acquisition: Bought from the Rev. G. J. Chester, 1891 (from the Genizah).
